channel.title: Xuan on Xuan's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Xuan on Xuan's blog

item.description: I’m Xuan, welcome to my blog! In my spare time, I like to coding, games, travelling, music and video!
If you know about computer vision and are interested in my project, you can view my project homepage, or send me an email

Xuan Zhu First-year Ph. D. Student Victoria University of Wellington, Wellington, New Zealand Email: xuan.zhu@vuw.ac.nz Biography I am a Ph. D. student in Victoria University of Wellington (VUW), supervised by Dr. Fang-Lue Zhang, Prof. Paul Rosin and Prof. Yu-Kun Lai. My current research interests are image/video processing and generation. In 2022, I received my master degree in the Sichuan University (Project 985 in China), supervised by Pro. Wei Li, studying deep learning, image/ video object detection and image video processing.

Competitions “Huawei Cup” The 17th Chinese Postgraduate Mathematical Modeling Competition (Second Prize) “Huawei Cup” The 2nd Chinese Postgraduate Artificial Intelligence Innovation Competition (Third Prize) “Flying shark Cup” The 6th Chinese Postgraduate Future Aircraft Innovation Competition (Third Prize)

Selected Publications Zhu, X., Liang, B., Fu, D., Huang, G., Yang, F., Li, W.: Airport Small Object Detection Based on Feature Enhancement. IET Image Process. 16, 2863–2874 (2022). Hai Jiang, Xuan Zhu, Ren Yang, Yutong Hao, Fengzhu Zou, Fang Lin and Songchen Han. R2RNet: Low-light. Image Enhancement via Real-low to Real-normal Network. Journal of Visual Communication and Image Representation, 2023. Fan Yang, Xiangtong Wang, Xuan Zhu, Binbin Liang, Wei Li. Relation-Based Holistic-Partial Feature Learning Network for Video-Based Person Re-identification.
